data.title: And Quiet Flows the Don
data.meta_description: And Quiet Flows the Don is a novel in four volumes by Russian writer Mikhail Sholokhov. The first three volumes were written from 1925 to 1932 and published in the Soviet magazine Oktyabr in 1928–1932, and the fourth volume was finished in 1940.
data.text:
"Tikhiy Don" redirects here. For the train, see Tikhiy Don (train).

"Grigory and Aksinya" redirects here. For the scultpures, see Grigory and Aksinya (sculpture composition) and Grigory and Aksinya in a boat (sculpture composition).

"The Quiet Don" redirects here. For the manga series, see Shizukanaru Don – Yakuza Side Story.

And Quiet Flows the Don (Quiet Flows the Don or The Silent Don, Russian: Тихий Дон, literally The Quiet Don) is a novel in four volumes by Russian writer Mikhail Sholokhov. The first three volumes were written from 1925 to 1932 and published in the Soviet magazine Oktyabr in 1928–1932, and the fourth volume was finished in 1940.
